DESCRIPTION: Play a copy of this card for each previous card played this turn (you can't take damage while playing copies).
At the end of your turn, take damage equal to half your #yBleeding (round up), and then reduce your #yBleeding by that amount.

Can only spawn in card rewards if your deck contains the associated #yLure card. Always spawns in non-boss card rewards that have at least 1 #yrare. When added to your deck, the corresponding #yLure is removed.

While this is in your deck, it's associated #yPredator card is added to the card reward pool and will always spawn in non-boss card rewards that have at least 1 #yrare. When the corresponding #yPredator card is added to your deck, remove this.
This card cannot be upgraded outside of combat.
Permanently remove this card from your deck.
Prevents the next buff that would be applied to target.
Return a card from your discard pile to your hand and upgrade it.
Select a card from your draw pile and discard it.
The next time this enemy would deal damage, prevent damage equal to the ink value, deal that much damage to the enemy, and then remove that much ink.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
